# Preface {.unnumbered}

These are the course notes for Prof. [Brenton Kenkel](https://bkenkel.com)'s course PSCI 8350 at Vanderbilt University.
The course covers the bare essential mathematical techniques needed for applied work in statistics and formal theory in political science.

This book is written in [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) and published on [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/).
You can find the Quarto source files [on GitHub](https://github.com/brentonk/mfpa).
